mapper.insert: insert into DATA(dseq,iseq,data) values((SELECT ifnull(max(dseq), 0) + 1 FROM DATA b),(SELECT ifnull(max(iseq), 0) + 0 FROM INFO a),#{data });
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DATA WHERE ISEQ=#{iseq} ORDER BY DSEQ ASC
SELECT * FROM DATA WHERE ISEQ=#{iseq} AND DATA LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT data FROM DATA WHERE ISEQ=#{iseq} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
